timeline.bodyText:
1 trivial question:
If it is true, does it mean we have enumerated all the right tuples, but there are still some tuple remaining (not yet matched) on the left relation?
timeline.author: hsyuan

replies.bodyText: Correct, it means the right input is over, but the left is not; hence all remaining tuples from the left relation are results for the anti-join
replies.author: rubenada
